snippet: In Switzerland, where cows are under stress to be more productive and are showing fewer signs of being in heat, a new device lets farmers know when the time is right.
abstract: Device that implants sensors in cows to let farmers know when they are in heat is being tested in Switzerland; project is designed to address problem of dairy cows showing fewer and fewer signs of heat because they are physically under stress to produce larger quantities of milk.
lead_paragraph: In Switzerland, where cows are under stress to be more productive and are showing fewer signs of being in heat, a new device lets farmers know when the time is right.

headline.seo: Device Sends Message to Swiss Farmer When Cow Is in Heat
headline.main: Swiss Cows Send Texts to Announce They’re in Heat
headline.print_headline: Swiss Cows Send Texts to Announce They’re in Heat
